pageTitle: Dillee smog: is haphte aapane kitanee sigaret pee?
author: Mere dvaara!
quote: Dillee mein saans lena ausatan ek din mein ek darjan se adhik sigaret peene ke kareeb hai
p1: Dillee mein saans lena ausatan ek din mein ek darjan se adhik sigaret peene ke kareeb hai. apane shahar par klik karake pata karen ki aap kitanee sigaret pee rahe hain.
p2: 7 navambar ko, bhaarateey raajadhaanee, dillee mein ghane bhoore rang ke smog kee chaadar odh lee. vishaakt dhundh itanee gambheer thee ki raajanetaon ne skoolon ko band karane kee yojana kee ghoshana kee. yoonaited eyaralains ne amerika se dillee ke lie apanee sabhee udaanen band kar deen. vishv svaasthy sangathan kee kuchh kshetron mein anushansit seema 30 guna tak pahunch jaane ke kaaran drshyata kharaab thee.
p3: Sistam oph eyar kvaalitee vedar phorakaasting end risarch vebasait ke aankadon ke anusaar, chhote kanon ke star (jise peeem 2.5 kaha jaata hai) jo ki phephadon mein gaharaee se pravesh karate hain, navambar mein dillee ke kuchh ilaakon mein 700 maikrograam prati kyoobik meetar tak pahunch gae the. 6 th. pm 2.5 ke lie vaayu gunavatta maanak 15 qualityg / m3 hai aur 81 mg / m3 se oopar kuchh bhee kharaab vaayu gunavatta maanak ke antargat aata hai.
p4: Kuchh riporton mein daava kiya gaya tha ki naee dillee kee vaayu gunavatta itanee gambheer thee ki yah ek din mein 45 sigaret peene ke baraabar thee. hamane aankadon par gaur kiya ki kya yah sach hai.
p5: Pichhale saptaah ke pradooshan ke kaaran aapane kitanee sigaret pee hai, yah jaanane ke lie apane shahar par klik karen.
p6: 1 sigaret ek din ke lie 22 mg / m3 (nirapeksh mooly: 21.6 mg / m3) ke vaayu pradooshan ke baraabar hai.
p7: *Naksha raajy ke shahar par prakaash daala ja sakata hai.
p8: Barkale arth kee ek riport se pata chala hai ki cheen mein har saal peeem 2.5 ke 52 mg / m3 ke ausat eksapozar se 1.6 miliyan log marate hain. 1.6 miliyan logon ko maarane ke lie 1.36 x9 ^ 6 prati sigaret, 1.1 triliyan sigaret kee maut kee aavashyakata hogee. choonki cheen kee janasankhya 1.35 biliyan hai, jo prati vyakti prati varsh 764 sigaret, ya prati din lagabhag 2.4 sigaret aatee hai.
p9: Ek aur tareeka rakho, ek sigaret ek din ke lie 22 mg / m3 (nirapeksh mooly: 21.6 mg / m3) ke vaayu pradooshan ke baraabar hai.
p10: Beejing mein varsh mein ausatan pm2.5 85 mg / m3 hai, jo prati din lagabhag 4 sigaret ke baraabar hai. isee tarah, yadi naee dillee, bhaarat mein vaayu pradooshan 546 mg / m3 hai, to yah pratyek din lagabhag 25 sigaret ke baraabar hai.
p11: Hamane bhaarat ke 33 shaharon ke peeem 2.5 deta ko ek saptaah tak har din liya. hamane pratyek shahar ke 6 dinon ke peeem 2.5 deta kee ganana kee aur sigaret kee sankhya praapt karane ke lie ise 21.6 mg / m3 se vibhaajit kiya. yah kahana bhee anivaary hai ki dikhaee gaee sankhya yah dhaarana hai ki aapane aadarsh roop se apana adhikatar samay baahar se saans lene mein bitaaya hai.
